channel.title: Coding a 508 (Problem 1)
channel.description:
ok guys, i have some troubles, you see, im starting a 508 server, but i need help coding what npcs say, im new to coding 508s and yeah. so i need help with what the ncp would say over his head like "Welcome to..." get it? anyways. if your a good 508 coder then can you add my msn? its A-d-A-m-C-o-U-r-T_@hotmail.com Thanks, much appretiated.
PS the reason i named is Problem 1 is because im gonna have a various amount of problems during, so there is gonna be more topics from me. Again thanks.
